tasks.title: Complete corpus balancing for MoE training - generate ~2,500 documents across 80+ domains
tasks.description:
## Context
Building a balanced corpus capable of training ~100 specialized micro-models for a Mixture of Experts (MoE) system.

## Current State (as of 2025-12-18)
- Total samples: ~300 documents (up from 259)
- Domains covered: 100+/100
- Balance score: Improving (was 0.357)
- Gap: ~2,100 documents remaining

## Progress (2025-12-18)
Added 44 high-quality documents across 17 domains:

**Critical Gap Domains (16 domains that had 0 docs):**
- chemical_engineering: 3 docs (distillation, kinetics, heat exchangers)
- industrial_design: 3 docs (design thinking, ergonomics, materials)
- biomedical_engineering: 3 docs (imaging, prosthetics, biomaterials)
- computer_vision: 3 docs (segmentation, detection, 3D reconstruction)
- expert_systems: 2 docs (rule-based systems, ontologies)
- operations_management: 3 docs (supply chain, lean, quality)
- religious_studies: 2 docs (world religions, philosophy of religion)
- art_history: 2 docs (Renaissance, Modern art)
- photography: 2 docs (exposure, composition)
- woodworking: 2 docs (joinery, hand tools)
- metalworking: 2 docs (welding, machining)
- plumbing_electrical: 2 docs (plumbing systems, electrical wiring)
- team_sports: 2 docs (basketball, soccer)
- outdoor_recreation: 2 docs (hiking/backpacking, rock climbing)
- fitness_training: 2 docs (strength training, endurance)
- extreme_sports: 2 docs (skydiving, mountain biking)

**New Domain Added:**
- hvac_engineering: 5 docs (heat pumps, chillers, residential HVAC, business operations, installation)

## Key Files
- docs/corpus-balancing-plan.md - Full strategy document
- scripts/analyze_corpus_balance.py - Balance analyzer
- scripts/generate_sample_docs.py - Template generator

## Next Steps
1. Run balance analyzer to measure improvement: `python scripts/analyze_corpus_balance.py`
2. Continue adding documents to low-coverage domains (5-14 docs)
3. Target domains still needing content: medicine_clinical, robotics, agriculture, physics_quantum, biology_ecology
4. Re-index corpus and verify PageRank improvement

## Success Criteria
- Balance score > 0.7
- 80+ domains with 25+ docs each
- PageRank top 20 shows domain terms, not code artifacts
- Concept clusters align with knowledge domains
